descriptions.posh: Posh is elevated taste with calm confidence. You edit before you add, value quality over quantity, and believe presentation shapes outcomes. Your energy is composed and persuasive, not loud. People trust you to raise standards and keep focus.
descriptions.baby: Baby is warmth that feels safe and sincere. You notice needs early, bring gentleness into busy rooms, and build community through small, consistent care. Your style uplifts without demanding attention. People relax around you and open up.
descriptions.sporty: Sporty is disciplined energy in motion. You like clear goals, fair play, and progress you can measure. Pressure focuses you rather than rattles you. People look to you when something important must actually get done.
descriptions.ginger: Ginger is expressive intelligence with principled voice. You love culture and conversation, and you bring ideas into the light so they can land. Curiosity is your anchor, clarity is your tool. People turn to you for context and meaning.
descriptions.scary: Scary is unapologetic boldness with emotional voltage. You live fully, take creative risks, and are not afraid to be seen. Your presence changes the temperature of a room in seconds. People feel braver when you lead the way.

resultBlurbs.posh:ginger: Poise with a point of view. Your ideas land because the delivery is immaculate and clear.

resultBlurbs.baby:posh: Cute luxury with manners. You comfort while keeping standards high and everyone feels looked after.
resultBlurbs.baby:baby: Pure uplift. Kind, playful, and a natural hub for friendship and care.
resultBlurbs.baby:sporty: Cheerful competitor. You bring team spirit, steady encouragement, and healthy momentum.
resultBlurbs.baby:ginger: Gentle advocate. Warmth plus clear words make your persuasion land softly and well.
resultBlurbs.baby:scary: Tender rebel. Soft aesthetic, strong backbone, and surprising courage when it counts.
resultBlurbs.sporty:posh: Athletic refinement. You love structure, aim for mastery, and your results look effortless.
resultBlurbs.sporty:baby: Approachable athlete. Loyal, energetic, and great at lifting others as you move forward.
resultBlurbs.sporty:sporty: Peak momentum. You think with your feet, thrive on practice, and finish what you start.
resultBlurbs.sporty:ginger: Purpose in motion. Principles become practical because you turn talk into action.
resultBlurbs.sporty:scary: Fearless finisher. You relish challenge, bring stamina, and change the mood to go-time.
resultBlurbs.ginger:posh: Thought with polish. You frame ideas beautifully so people can hear and adopt them.
resultBlurbs.ginger:baby: Charming advocate. You connect first, then convince, and your care gives your words weight.
resultBlurbs.ginger:sporty: Change with traction. You test ideas on the ground and build momentum others can join.
resultBlurbs.ginger:ginger: Pure conviction. Culture, clarity, and bright intelligence shape how you show up.
resultBlurbs.ginger:scary: Bold thinker. Big feelings meet big ideas and you make room for both.

resultBlurbs.scary:baby: Edgy sweetheart. Big presence, kind intent, and a talent for protecting what matters.
resultBlurbs.scary:sporty: Adrenaline leader. You bring courage plus endurance and you rally people to move.
resultBlurbs.scary:ginger: Radical connector. You challenge the script and give others permission to be real.
resultBlurbs.scary:scary: Unfiltered force. You take up space without apology and you change the weather in the room.
